business.name: Ruby's Wine Shop
business.tagline: Natural wines & good vibes in Albion

hungry.heading: Feeling Hungry?
description: We've partnered with Olive Thyme next door to bring you seriously good food without leaving your seat.
Browse their menu of share plates, wood-fired pizzas, and Mediterranean-inspired dishes—all designed to pair beautifully with natural wine.
Order at the bar and we'll coordinate delivery to your table. Easy.

image.alt: Two glasses of natural wine at Ruby's Wine Shop

about.heading: Meet Ruby
story: Ruby's is a sliver of Swiss wine culture in Albion. We are an intimate neighborhood bar and shop focused on natural and minimal intervention wines. We're here for spontaneous visits, good conversations, and letting the evening unfold however it wants to.

The bar is named after our founder's border collie, Ruby. She is a perpetually optimistic pup who greets every visitor like an old friend and firmly believes the world revolves around her. She is usually right. We try to match her warm, welcoming energy.

With over 250 bottles on the shelf and 6 to 8 rotating daily pours, including our own house-made Pet Nat, there is always something new to try. We keep things simple with indoor and outdoor seating and a walk-ins only policy. Bring your own snacks or scan a QR code to have modern Turkish meze from our neighbors at Olive Thyme delivered straight to your stool.

image.alt: Ruby the border collie jumping up to greet her owner at Ruby's Wine Shop

events.title: Ruby Turns 7!
events.description: Join us to celebrate Ruby's 7th birthday party! Come say happy birthday to everyone's favourite wine bar pup.

events.title: Swiss Wine Night
events.description: Come try and discover the art of Swiss wine with Daniel Sangermani from Invidia Wines.

image.alt: Swiss Wine Night with Daniel Sangermani from Invidia Wines

events.title: Ruby's Quiz Night
events.date: Every second wednsday of the month from 6pm
events.description:
Join us for our monthly quiz night, hosted by the famous Weekly Fifty! Next one on the 11th march 6pm! Bookings open 2 weeks before the date to book your team in. Spots are limited and book out fast! 
Booking link: https://forms.gle/fwHN9JcYjNMXNg946
Waitlist link: https://forms.gle/AdYF73BBDJVTQVmX6

events.title: Spanish Night
events.description:
Join us for a spanish themed evening with some snack specials and incredible spanish wines. Tom from Alimentaria, a melbourne based spanish wine distrubution company, will be sharig his expertise. So if you have wanted to learn more about spanish wine, here is your chance! 
Walk in only as usual and free - just sample and purchase a glass, bottle or more

items.question: Do you take bookings?
items.answer: Walk-ins only. With an intimate 20-seat capacity, we believe the best nights are unplanned. We love the energy of a spontaneous visit, so just turn up and we'll find you a spot.

items.question: Are you dog-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely! We're a dog friendly venue and well-behaved pups are welcome. We'll even bring them a water bowl.

items.question: What about food?
items.answer: BYO snacks are always welcome. We've also partnered with our neighbors at Olive Thyme - simply scan the QR code at your table to order modern Turkish meze delivered straight to your stool.

items.question: Can I buy wine to take home?
items.answer: Yes! We're a licensed bottle shop. All bottles on our list are available for retail purchase to take away, or you can enjoy them on-site with a small corkage fee.

items.question: What are your opening hours?
items.answer: We're open Wednesday from 4 PM and Thursday to Sunday from 12 PM. We close at 9 PM every night. Closed Monday and Tuesday.

items.question: Where can I park?
items.answer: There's a free car park out the back, plus street parking on Sandgate Road and surrounding streets. Albion train station is a 5-minute walk if you're taking public transport.

image.alt: Ruby's Wine Shop storefront with logo and warm interior lighting
Ruby's Wine Shop in the historic Albion Building on Sandgate Road

hero.headline: Natural wines meet neighbourhood charm
hero.subheadline: A cosy wine bar in the heart of Albion celebrating minimal intervention wines, local snacks, and spontaneous evenings

images.alt: Ruby's Wine Bar interior with warm lighting and wine bottles

seo.title: Ruby's Wine Bar & Shop | Albion, Brisbane
seo.description: A cosy Albion wine bar celebrating natural wines, local snacks, and spontaneous evenings. Walk-in only, dog-friendly, and proudly independent.

byTheGlass.heading: By the Glass
byTheGlass.description: Taste your way through our rotating daily selection — Ruby's picks. Always 2 whites, rosé, skin contact and a few reds plus the odd special.

byTheBottle.heading: By the Bottle
byTheBottle.description:
You have the flexibility of choosing any wine off the shelf to drink in store. Just add $30 to any take home price, no matter how big or small, to enjoy our hospitality in our space.

We stock a rotating selection of unique and classic wines from all over the world. From hard to find drops from Switzerland, to skin contact Georgian beauties. Even a great selection of wines from our own backyard, QLD.

walkInModal.heading: No Bookings, Just Good Vibes
message: We're proudly walk-in only. Why? Because we believe the best evenings are spontaneous, and the best conversations happen when you let the night unfold naturally.
Just show up and we'll take care of the rest. If we're full, we'll text you when a spot opens up-grab a drink nearby and we'll see you soon.
